abstract: Land mine in Mali kills United Nations staff member four days after terrorist attack on Radisson Blu Hotel, which killed at least 19 people.
lead_paragraph: The death underlined persistent insecurity four days after Islamist militants attacked a hotel in the capital, Bamako, and killed at least 19 people.

headline.main: Mali: Land Mine Kills a U.N. Employee
headline.print_headline: Africa; Mali: Land Mine Kills a U.N. Employee

snippet: The death underlined persistent insecurity four days after Islamist militants attacked a hotel in the capital, Bamako, and killed at least 19 people.
